description:
Please contact Dr. Steven Wilhelm (wilhelm@utk.edu) or Maddie Denney (mdenney5@vols.utk.edu) for additional information regarding this protocol.

 

Modified from Guan, Riezman, Wenk & Riezman, 2010

 

Please note that there are two versions of this protocol. Use the one that corresponds to your sample.

groups.group_name: The Aquatic Microbial Ecology Research Group - AMERG (The Buchan, Zinser and Wilhelm labs)

components.data: Prepare lipid extraction solvent (step 2) with a 1:1 ratio of butanol and lab purified water (water-saturated butanol, and lab purified water
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare lipid extraction solvent (step 2) with a 1:1 ratio of butanol and lab purified water (water-saturated butanol, and lab purified water

components.name: Section

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of Cyanobacteria Total Lipid Extraction
source_data.annotation: This is written incorrectly.  Should state: "Prepare lipid extraction solvent (step 2), 1:1 ratio butanol and lab purified water (water-saturated butanol), and lab purified water."
source_data.thread_text: This is written incorrectly.  Should state: "Prepare lipid extraction solvent (step 2), 1:1 ratio butanol and lab purified water (water-saturated butanol), and lab purified water."
source_data.body: This is written incorrectly.  Should state: "Prepare lipid extraction solvent (step 2), 1:1 ratio butanol and lab purified water (water-saturated butanol), and lab purified water."

components.data: Extraction solvent is a 15:15:5:1:0.18 ratio by volume solvent composed of 95% ethanol, water, diethyl ether, pyridine, and 4.2 N ammonium hydroxide
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Extraction solvent is a 15:15:5:1:0.18 ratio by volume solvent composed of 95% ethanol, water, diethyl ether, pyridine, and 4.2 N ammonium hydroxide

components.name: Section

source_data.section: Version 1 - Lab Grown Cultures and Liquid Environmental Cultures

components.data: Grow cultures to log phase and collect 2 mL in 2 mL microfuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grow cultures to log phase and collect 2 mL in 2 mL microfuge tube.

components.data: Version 1 - Lab Grown Cultures and Liquid Environmental Cultures
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Version 1 - Lab Grown Cultures and Liquid Environmental Cultures

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of Cyanobacteria Total Lipid Extraction
source_data.annotation: If the sample is a liquid environmental sample, simply proceed without grow up peroid. A minimum of 500 µL of sample is needed.
source_data.thread_text: If the sample is a liquid environmental sample, simply proceed without grow up peroid. A minimum of 500 µL of sample is needed.
source_data.body: If the sample is a liquid environmental sample, simply proceed without grow up peroid. A minimum of 500 µL of sample is needed.

components.data: Optional step: Remove a small aliquot (100 µL) of culture and fix with 5% by volume glutaraldehyde for later cell counts for normalizing lipid amounts. Store at 20ºC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Optional step: Remove a small aliquot (100 µL) of culture and fix with 5% by volume glutaraldehyde for later cell counts for normalizing lipid amounts. Store at 20ºC.

components.name: Section

source_data.section: Version 2 - Sterivex Filtered Environmental Sample

components.data: Use a Sterivex cutter to open the plastic unit. Using a sterile razor blade, cut filter off of unit and cut into small pieces. Place filter pieces in a 2 mL microfuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Use a Sterivex cutter to open the plastic unit. Using a sterile razor blade, cut filter off of unit and cut into small pieces. Place filter pieces in a 2 mL microfuge tube.
